title: Which members from Everglow are in IZ*ONE? - Quora

response.answer_text: No one. Part of IZ*One’s contract terms is that the members can’t promote with any other group while part of IZ*One. And Everglow debuted after IZ*one did so there are currently no girl who is in both groups. Everglow’s company, YueHua Ent. sent 3 girls to compete on produce 48: Sihyeon, Yiren, and Yena. Yena ranked in the top 12 during the finale of the show and thus debuted as a member of IZ*one. The other two returned to the company and debuted with Everglow a few months after IZ*One. Judging by how soon after the show ended Everglow debuted, its very very likely Yena was part of the lineup for the group. But because of contract obligations to IZ*One, she cannot join Everglow for the time being. There’s a good chance YueHua will add her to the group once IZ*One disbands but that’s another year and a half so who knows? They may just debut Yena as a soloist instead.
